alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 12:49PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Walton, western Holmes and central Washington Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1148 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles northeast of Eglin Air Force Base to near De Funiak Springs to 16 miles west of Vernon. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Live Oak, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Hinsons Crossroads, Whitehead Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Gritney, Arrant Settlement, De Funiak Spring Airport, Rock Hill, Millers Ferry, Center Ridge, Knox Hill, Hickory Hill and Izagora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington
